display_long_description:
Step into the ring with VR Boxing & MMA, a full-bodied combat experience built around dual-controller interaction and quick, satisfying feedback. Throw precise jabs, hooks, and uppercuts with each hand, use either joystick for tight footwork and held tilts for big lunging steps, and chain special moves (X/Y/A/B) to turn the tide.

Key features:
• Three Modes: Quick Clash for instant bouts, Road to Glory (career progression), and Elite Showdown (high-skill challenges).
• Roster & Weight Classes: Heavyweight, Middleweight and Lightweight divisions; each class contains unique fighters. Manage all your fighters in the Warrior Gallery.
• Deep Customization: Style Studio lets you edit hair, facial hair, tattoos, height, weight, body definition, name, nationality, and fighting style. Visualize and upgrade standing and ground moves independently.
• Shop & Progression: Earn in-game currency to buy fighters, shorts, gloves, hairstyles, tattoos, training tickets, boosters, and ability points. Train to raise stats and unlock new combos.
• Specials & Clinch: Land hits to charge special moves; use X/Y/A/B to activate them. Clinch to recover and play a fast minigame to gain an advantage. Ground events add tactical depth.
• Coaches & Styles: Hire coaches to unlock new techniques and tailor your fighter’s style and move set.
• Accessible, Immersive Combat: Responsive controls tuned for low latency. Feel immediate hits and responsive defense while preserving comfort for VR play.
